TEXT.TITLE: SIERRACIN <SER> PAYS DEBT, GETS NEW LOAN PACT
TEXT.BODY: Sierracin Corp said it completed the repayment of its entire 14 mln dlr bank debt and entered a new, unsecured revolving credit term loan agreement. The new arrangement provides for borrowings of up to 10 mln dlrs at the bank's prime rate and replaces a secured credit line which expired in February, Sierracin also said. Reuter
